body:
I am not able to make that conditional through the select() function because there is a macro which iterates over all srcs and is not able to iterate over select():
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tensorflow.bzl#L329
it throws error: "type 'select' is not iterable".
Is there any way to add conditional value beside select()?
